data.lyric:
[ti:Ain't Got No Love]
[ar:王俊凯]
[al:Ain't Got No Love]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Ain't Got No Love - 王俊凯
[00:01.28]词：Sara Maria Forsberg/Josh Cumbee
[00:02.57]曲：Sara Maria Forsberg/Josh Cumbee
[00:03.85]编曲：Josh Cumbee
[00:05.14]制作人：Josh Cumbee
[00:06.43]和声：王俊凯/Josh Cumbee
[00:07.71]混音工程师：Brian Malouf
[00:09.00]母带工程师：Michelle Mancini
[00:10.29]If I said it once I said it a thousand times before
[00:14.84]I'm down
[00:15.91]To lay in roses but I'm done getting cut on your thorns
[00:21.14]Girl it's cool if you don't wanna get that close Jus' know
[00:25.98]I'm over putting up with fires & liars for sure
[00:30.39]For so long I gave you so much I cracked
[00:35.49]I'm still tryna put the pieces back
[00:40.56]I ain't got no love for you
[00:43.22]I ain't got no love
[00:44.85]Cuz I spent it on myself
[00:47.19]I've been spending on myself
[00:50.49]No I ain't got no love for you
[00:53.27]I ain't got no love
[00:54.75]Don't want it from nobody else
[00:57.42]Jus' in case you couldn't tell
[00:58.95]I'm doing fine without you
[01:02.63]But I don't mind if you come through
[01:05.12]Just as long as long as you're not catching feelings
[01:10.22]Because I ain't got no love
[01:13.56]I ain't got no love
[01:15.85]Ain't got no more love for you
[01:20.88]It's just a cup of coffee couple nights of skipping sleep
[01:25.52]Jus' know
[01:26.60]It's not the same us getting
[01:28.57]Tangled all up in these sheets
[01:30.41]If it ain't worth the fun
[01:33.02]I understand you can cut and run
[01:36.72]And find another one to do like the way you did me
[01:41.13]For so long I gave you so much I cracked
[01:46.23]I'm still tryna put the pieces back
[01:50.82]Because I ain't got no love for you
[01:54.00]I ain't got no love
[01:55.69]Cuz I spent it on myself
[01:57.96]I've been spending on myself
[02:01.09]No I ain't got no love for you
[02:03.96]I ain't got no love
[02:05.48]Don't want it from nobody else
[02:08.09]Jus' in case you couldn't tell
[02:09.68]I'm doing fine without you
[02:13.27]But I don't mind if you come through
[02:15.82]Just as long as long as you're not catching feelings
[02:20.97]Because I ain't got no love
[02:24.30]I ain't got no love
[02:26.68]Ain't got no more love for you
[02:32.72]It's not you it's the whole thing
[02:34.57]I got my minds on bigger better brighter things
[02:37.57]It's a better way to spend my energy
[02:41.66]But hey if you get a little lonely
[02:44.80]You can call me up but baby only
[02:47.11]If you don't forget
[02:51.91]I ain't got no love for you
[02:54.54]I ain't got no love
[02:56.31]Cuz I spent it on myself
[02:58.60]I've been spending on myself
[03:01.83]No I ain't got no love for you
[03:04.59]I ain't got no love
[03:06.27]Don't want it from nobody else
[03:08.81]Jus' in case you couldn't tell
[03:10.25]I'm doing fine without you
[03:14.04]But I don't mind if you come through
[03:16.50]Just as long as long as you're not catching feelings
[03:21.60]Because I ain't got no love
[03:24.87]I ain't got no love
[03:27.29]Ain't got no more love for you
data.trans:
[ti:Ain't Got No Love]
[ar:王俊凯]
[al:Ain't Got No Love]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:01.28]//
[00:02.57]//
[00:03.85]//
[00:05.14]//
[00:06.43]//
[00:07.71]//
[00:09.00]//
[00:10.29]每一次对你开口心里其实早已踌躇过千万遍
[00:14.84]我很失落
[00:15.91]躺在你怀中却被你深深刺痛
[00:21.14]女孩如果你不想靠近这没有关系 要知道
[00:25.98]我已经无法再忍受这些争吵和谎言
[00:30.39]长久以来 为你付出的太多让我支离破碎
[00:35.49]我仍在努力让自己振作起来
[00:40.56]我已经不爱你了
[00:43.22]我不再爱你了
[00:44.85]因为我开始正视自己
[00:47.19]我开始懂得爱人先爱己
[00:50.49]不我已经不再爱你了
[00:53.27]我不再爱你了
[00:54.75]不再期望从别人身上得到爱
[00:57.42]如果你还没看出来
[00:58.95]没有你我也过的很好
[01:02.63]但我不介意如果你再来联络
[01:05.12]只要你不要再牵扯感情
[01:10.22]因为我不再爱你了
[01:13.56]我不再爱你
[01:15.85]我不再爱你了
[01:20.88]不过一杯咖啡 几夜无眠
[01:25.52]你该明白
[01:26.60]我们已不复从前
[01:28.57]过往的缠绵早已消散
[01:30.41]如果已然毫无乐趣
[01:33.02]我理解你能断的决然
[01:36.72]去找下一个人对他做同样的伤害
[01:41.13]长久以来 为你付出的太多让我支离破碎
[01:46.23]我仍在努力让自己振作起来
[01:50.82]我已经不爱你了
[01:54.00]我不再爱你了
[01:55.69]因为我开始正视自己
[01:57.96]我开始懂得爱人先爱己
[02:01.09]不我已经不再爱你了
[02:03.96]我不再爱你了
[02:05.48]不再期望从别人身上得到爱
[02:08.09]如果你还没看出来
[02:09.68]没有你我也过的很好
[02:13.27]但我不介意如果你再来联络
[02:15.82]只要你不要再牵扯感情
[02:20.97]因为我不再爱你了
[02:24.30]我不再爱你
[02:26.68]我不再爱你了
[02:32.72]不是因为你 是因为这所有的一切
[02:34.57]让我开始思考更重要和美好的事
[02:37.57]这更值得我去花费精力
[02:41.66]但如果你感到有点孤独
[02:44.80]你可以找我
[02:47.11]但只要你别忘了
[02:51.91]我已经不爱你了
[02:54.54]我不再爱你了
[02:56.31]因为我开始正视自己
[02:58.60]我开始懂得爱人先爱己
[03:01.83]不我已经不再爱你了
[03:04.59]我不再爱你了
[03:06.27]不再期望从别人身上得到爱
[03:08.81]如果你还没看出来
[03:10.25]没有你我也过的很好
[03:14.04]但我不介意如果你再来联络
[03:16.50]只要你不要再牵扯感情
[03:21.60]因为我不再爱你了
[03:24.87]我不再爱你
[03:27.29]我不再爱你了
